about_the_game:
Innovative fusion of automatic combat and Trading Card Games! Become the adventurer Kamus and travel through several unknown star worlds. Summon monsters from other worlds to assist you on your conquest journey through highly liberalized decks!

Game features:

·Extremely high degree of freedom deck construction: Before embarking on an adventure, you can choose and edit unique decks, and continuously acquire new cards during the adventure, dynamically adjusting decks to adapt to complex and ever-changing combat environments.

·Instant automatic combat: During the time freeze period, all units on the field are unable to move, and multiple effects can be achieved using cards. You need to choose the right time to freeze your time in order to maximize your advantage.

·Rich and diverse items: During the adventure, you can obtain various items, all of which play a very important role. Choose appropriate item combinations and combine them with decks to achieve maximum profits.

· Free exploration: Move freely in the mesh map without being bound by the direction of travel. But note that the difficulty of the game will continue to increase as the number of action rounds increases!

short_description: In the universe billions of years later, life no longer exists. The adventurer Kamus travels to the unknown star realm as a hope to break the deadlock, exploring the ultimate destiny of the soul through battle and conquest.
